org.jetel.database.dbf

Class DBFMemoParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.database.dbf.DBFMemoParser

  • public class DBFMemoParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for parsing data from DBF memo file - various types -FoxPro, DBaseIII, DBaseIV. Does not extend from AbstractParser thus can not be used in standard reader. A special component is used.
    Structure info from http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~varun/cs315p/xbase.txt. Further information is available at https://wiki.javlin.eu/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=4883082
